title: [Maaghara Tower]
description: After turning a diagonal leg southeast from the main platform, the porch ends at the foot of a monumental door set into the side of the tree.  The door is heavily carved, its surface a wealth of interlocking scenes.  Most depict views of a forest.  A single knob occupies the door's center.

After turning a diagonal leg southwest from the main platform, the porch ends at the foot of a monumental door set into the side of the tree.  The door is heavily carved, its surface a wealth of interlocking scenes.  Most depict views of a forest.  A single knob occupies the door's center.
